alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Howell; Ozark; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:04AM CDT until July 13 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... Eastern Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Howell County in south central Missouri... Southeastern Texas County in south central Missouri... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 204 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Cabool to near Willow Springs to 12 miles south of Mountain Grove to 12 miles east of Ava, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... West Plains, Mountain View, Willow Springs, Cabool, Pomona, Summersville, Peace Valley, Arroll, Elk Creek, Eunice, Gentryville, Siloam Springs, White Church, Hartshorn, Vanzant, Clear Springs, Solo, Dora, Pine Crest and Drury. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
